infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: TasteSwap requires access to your camera to let you add dish pictures to share your food
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: TasteSwap needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload kitchen profile and dish images. Your images will not be shared without your permission
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: TasteSwap needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload kitchen profile and dish images. Your images will not be shared without your permission
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: TasteSwap requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & find kitchens near you
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: TasteSwap requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & find kitchens near you
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: TasteSwap requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & find kitchens near you
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: TasteSwap requires your location so that we can centre the map on you & find kitchens near you
